name: Murasaki Shion (Hololive)
description:
Murasaki Shion Lora.

Trigger Word: get murasaki shion

How to use:

  • You need to add the Lora tag "lora:murasaki_shion:1", and add some tags like "grey hair, yellow eyes, blunt bangs", finally, you can have a character similar to the picture. And of course, don't forget "get murasaki shion".

  • The model has 2 versions: normal and cat ears. If you want to use cat ears, just add the cat ears tag.

The images above were created using my Lora combined with the CetusMix, Grapefruit, anime-base-sd-v15, or anything models.

Limit:

  • The output of the model is still not really similar to the Murasaki Shion.

  • There is also NSFW, if you use it with a safe model, you should consider it carefully.

Training:

  • Data: 120 Murasaki Shion images.

  • Base model: anime-base-sd-v15_v20LTS

  • Schedule: DDIM.

  • Optimizer: AdamW.

  • LR: 0.0002

  • Precision: FP16.

  • Hardware: Google Colaboratory Pro - NVIDIA TESLA T4 15GB VRAM.

Loss chart:

Thank you for being so interested. Have fun (●'◡'●)
